cpm_mr_health_declaration_content: I confirm that I am in good health, and I will inform the course organizer of any limiting health conditions before the course begins. I further acknowledge that, if I am diagnosed with schizophrenia; schizoaffective, bipolar, or seizure disorders; pregnancy; and/or am a new mother or recent surgical patient, certain portions of this course may be unsuitable for me and I will consult with my medical provider before registering (medical information form for medical provider). I further acknowledge that if my medical provider has diagnosed me with Complex PTSD, an alternate version of this course may be more suitable for me.
